attributes.review: for one when i opened the app it took forever to load then the fbi came to my door and almost arrested me THEN the big cheeto man himself✨✨✨ came into my house and threatened to steal a chair THEN all these roaches started coming from his clothes and now i have roaches everywhere in my house DO NOT RECOMMEND 😾😾😾😾😾😾anyways bernie 2020
attributes.title: this app is the worst

attributes.review: the app made my phone glitch then shut down, i am currently on my iPad. i have to get a new phone in the morning because whenever i try to turn my phone on it has a black screen and it displays a picture of Trump which horrified me because I am horrified of oranges with the hair of corn.
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER!!!!!!

attributes.review: I had another account but it got hacked and my phone number was leaked. That is my personal information and I would like it to stay that way. Never again will I be using this app unless it is fixed!!
attributes.title: Needs to be better!

attributes.review: This app is so mf glitchy and it doesn’t work at all. It makes my phone have viruses and I had to get a whole new phone Bc of it. It literally trashed my phone when I downloaded it. I feel bad for other people who’s phone got messed up because of this TERRIBLE app
attributes.title: Just stop

attributes.review: Terrible app it worked every slow but I think it’s because my phone can sense racism so it’s not working. They also have a scary person right when you open the app and scared the crap out of me. He looked like the Cheeto tiger guy. Anyways I wouldn’t download this app at all.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: I downloaded this and my phone instantly started glitching. It wouldn’t let me do anything other than go on the app. When I tried to go on other apps it redirected me to this app and only asked for donations. Wish they would fix these glitches.
attributes.title: Buggy

attributes.review: WARNING ⚠️ a virus is installed when you download this app. Your phone is slowed down and your screen starts defecting. Not to mention the whole app is about spreading lies that want to hurt people of the lgbt, and black community. The government has access to spy on you if you download this app.
attributes.title: Installs a virus on your phone

attributes.review: This app gives out fake news and is not worth your time and it takes up all the space in your phone and gives your phone viruses so don’t download I had to get a whole new phone this is horrible 😡

attributes.review: This app is the worst app i have ever had. It glitches unlike any other app and kicks me out of it multiple times. It does a terrible job and makes me feel unsafe and dizzy when using it. I say just dont get the app because its terrible and disgusting in every way shape and form.
